port.label: Port
port.help: (Optional) Port for the InfluxDB database. Default: 8086

protocol.label: Protocol
protocol.help: (Optional) Protocol to be used for the InfluxDB database connection. Default: http

username.label: Username
username.help: (Optional) Username to be used for the InfluxDB database authentication.

password.label: Password
password.help: (Optional) Password to be used for the InfluxDB database authentication.

database.label: Database Name
database.help: Database Name where the Series is located.

series.label: Series Name
series.help: Series Name where the data will be saved.

tag_keys.label: Tag Keys
tag_keys.help: (Optional) Field name in the Data that will be used for the Tag keys values should be comma separated ie (tag1,tag2,tag3).
